vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἱκᾰν-όω,
make sufficient, qualify, [NT]:—passive, to be empowered, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; to be made complete, brought to perfection, of the soul, τῷ περιέχοντι [Refs 4th c.AD+]
__II passive, to be satisfied, content, τινι [LXX+1st c.BC+]; ἱκανούσθω ὑμῖν, with infinitive, let it suffice you.., i.e. do it no more, [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to make competent, qualify one for, authorize
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to make competent, qualify one for, authorize
to make sufficient, or competent, qualify, authorise 2Cor. 3:6; Col. 1:12*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ban đủ đầy ;  làm cho nó đủ, làm cho có khả năng; chuẩn bị
